MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA9 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Freemantle Avenue, Perth Avenue and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4PM . We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:43AM on 16th November 2020
